GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

queryDescriptions.sort_by: Sorts articles by a valid column - defaults to 'created_at'
queryDescriptions.order: Orders results in ascending ('ASC') or descending ('DESC') order - defaults to descending order
queryDescriptions.topic: Filters articles by a specific topic.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the reqested article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object containing all comments from from a certain article, sorted descending by date created

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to the provided article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the vote count of a specific article by article_id. The request body must include an object in the form { inc_votes: newVote } where newVote is an integer.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the specified comment by comment_id. No response body is returned upon success.

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users found in the database.

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object with containing the requested user
